code: @Override public void write(int b) throws IOException {     if (failOnWrite) {         throw new IOException("Faking write failure").     } else if (writeFailOn != null && writeFailOn == b) {         throw new IOException("Faking write failure").     }     if (fakeOutputStream == null) {         fakeOutputStream = new ByteArrayOutputStream().     }     fakeOutputStream.write(b). }

@Override public void write(byte[] array, int off, int len) throws IOException {     if (failOnWriteArray) {         throw new IOException("Faking write array failure").     }     if (writeArrayFailOn != null) {         if (writeArrayFailOn == array) {             throw new IOException("Faking write array failure").         }         for (int i = 0. i < Math.min(len, writeArrayFailOn.length). ++i) {             if (array[off + i] != writeArrayFailOn[i]) {                 super.write(array, off, len).                 return.             }         }         throw new IOException("Faking write array failure").     } else {         super.write(array, off, len).     } }
public byte[] getPayload() {     if (fakeOutputStream != null) {         return fakeOutputStream.toByteArray().     }     return null. }
